contest-event.event-date:
June 16, 1883 D Hardraw Scar
Hardraw Scar 0 Entertainments Contest Hardraw Scar hardraw-scar
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Green Dragon Inn, Hardraw, North Yorkshire Prizes: £25, £15, £10
After the contest, M. Blondin went through his remarkable feats on the high rope at an elevation of 50ft above the ground. A heavy shower fell, which rendered the rope difficult to perform upon, and consequently the wheelbarrow feat had to be omittted.
Dec. 21, 2012, 9:32 p.m. Dec. 21, 2012, 9:40 p.m.
1 Black Dyke Band Alexander Owen Rossini's Works / Rossini Fantasia / Reminiscences of Rossini [arr. Owen]
2 Rochdale Borough Alexander Owen Rossini's Works / Rossini Fantasia / Reminiscences of Rossini [arr. Owen]
3 Linthwaite Silver Band Edwin Swift William Tell [arr. Swift]
4 Earby Band George F. Birkinshaw Stiffelio [arr. Gladney]
5 West Hartlepool Old Thomas Hogg Euryanthe [unknown arranger]
